# Python Dependency Files
# ========================

# - `requirements.txt`: This file lists the Python packages required for the project, along with their versions.
# - `Pipfile`: This file is used by Pipenv to manage project dependencies and virtual environments.
# - `Pipfile.lock`: This file is automatically generated by Pipenv and contains a snapshot of the exact package versions installed.
# - `setup.py`: This file is used for packaging the project and defining its dependencies.
# - `pyproject.toml`: This file is used for specifying build system requirements and project metadata.
